flash.tools.debugger

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlayer, ActiveXPlayer, AIRPlayer, NetscapePluginPlayer, StandalonePlayer, ThreadSafePlayer

    public interface Player
    Describes a Flash player.
    Author:
    mmorearty

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACTIVEX
      Indicates an ActiveX-control Flash player, e.g.
      static int AIR
      Indicates the Flash player inside AIR.
      static int NETSCAPE_PLUGIN
      Indicates a Netscape-plugin Flash player, e.g.
      static int STANDALONE
      Indicates a standalone Flash player, e.g.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Browser getBrowser()
      Returns the web browser with which this player is associated, or null if this is the standalone player or AIR, or if we're not sure which browser will be run.
      File getPath()
      Returns the path to the Flash player file -- e.g. the path to FlashPlayer.exe, NPSWF32.dll, Flash.ocx, or adl.exe -- or null if not known.
      int getType()
      Returns what type of Player this is: STANDALONE, NETSCAPE_PLUGIN, ACTIVEX, or AIR.

    • Field Detail

      • STANDALONE

        static final int STANDALONE
        Indicates a standalone Flash player, e.g. FlashPlayer.exe.
        See Also:
        getType(), Constant Field Values

      • NETSCAPE_PLUGIN

        static final int NETSCAPE_PLUGIN
        Indicates a Netscape-plugin Flash player, e.g. NPSWF32.dll. Used on Windows by all Netscape-based browsers (e.g. Firefox etc.), and on Mac and Linux by all browsers.
        See Also:
        getType(), Constant Field Values

      • ACTIVEX

        static final int ACTIVEX
        Indicates an ActiveX-control Flash player, e.g. Flash.ocx. Used on Windows by Internet Explorer.
        See Also:
        getType(), Constant Field Values

      • AIR

        static final int AIR
        Indicates the Flash player inside AIR.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        int getType()
        Returns what type of Player this is: STANDALONE, NETSCAPE_PLUGIN, ACTIVEX, or AIR.

      • getPath

        File getPath()
        Returns the path to the Flash player file -- e.g. the path to FlashPlayer.exe, NPSWF32.dll, Flash.ocx, or adl.exe -- or null if not known. (Filenames are obviously platform-specific.)

        Note that the file is not guaranteed to exist. You can use File.exists() to test that.

      • getBrowser

        Browser getBrowser()
        Returns the web browser with which this player is associated, or null if this is the standalone player or AIR, or if we're not sure which browser will be run.
